name: nsmprime-blog-seo-validator
description: CI/CD Blog Post SEO Validation System with Next.js Blog

scripts.validate-post: node -e "const validator = require('./blog-seo-validator.js'); const v = new validator(process.argv[1]); v.runAllTests({primaryKeyword: process.argv[2], semanticKeywords: process.argv[3]?.split(',') || []}).then(r => console.log(v.generateReport(r)));"
scripts.blog:deploy: npm run blog:generate && npm run build && cp *.html out/ && cp -r css out/ && cp -r js out/ && cp -r images out/ && cp -r fonts out/ && cp -r audio out/ && cp -r video out/ && cp -r bat out/

author: NSM Prime Media Group
